name: Alternate Time
description:
This game was made from no previous development skills in one month. This was made just for the GameDev.tv Community Jam. Alternate Time was built from scratch in 20 days.

It's been really interesting learning everything from a Udemy course and putting it into practice. I stumbled across the GameDev.tv community jam on the 9th of May, after which I knew I wanted to get a final product entered into this game jam.

I made this game to show myself that I can learn a brand new skill in about 20 days. And 20 days later, I have a short but sweet game ready here. I love this community and developing with you guys, and I hope that another GameDev.tv community jam will happen soon, as this was loads of fun!

If you have any bugs or issues,  look in the discussions for a bug thread, and post your issues / bugs in there. I'll try and fix any and all bugs that you report!

Speedrun Mode

Finished the main game? Alternate Time also includes a Speedrun mode, in which you will have a timer and no dialog. Try and finish the game as fast as possible and submit your scores to the leaderboard!

Credits:

Textures: kenney.nl

Soundtrack: Gravity Sound - Mysterious

Main menu music: Pehrs puzzle

QA and Playtesting: Zwinn, w0zak 

Source:

Below you can find the source code for the game. No paid assets were used.
